justification: Vendor 1 states that Power BI 'transforms raw data into interactive and visually immersive insights,' which suggests the ability to analyze stored data and provide a business user-focused interface. The phrase 'enabling data-driven decision-making' partially addresses the requirement for informed decisions. However, there is no explicit mention of 'real-time' capabilities or support for multiple personas (operations, technology, business) in the interface, so full coverage is not demonstrated.
ability: The ability to analyze stored data (records) to derive insights and actions in a business user focused visual interface
